events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been classified as a refund request due to wrong item delivery mentioned by the customer.
Support agent Alice has been assigned to handle the refund request from the customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help with your refund request and will do my best to resolve it quickly.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order number so I can verify the issue?
I have attached photos of the incorrect product and my order number is 123456. Please process the refund quickly.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate your help and look forward to receiving the refund soon.
The refund case has been resolved and the customer has been informed that the refund is being processed.
Checking back to confirm if you have received your refund and if everything is satisfactory on your end.
Closing the case since the refund has been successfully processed and no further issues were reported.
